snippet.title: Gordian Quest Realm Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/981430/Gordian_Quest/
We are pleased to unveil a brand new game mode called the Realm Mode. Here, your heroes enter the Maelstrom Gate to challenge an endless chain of procedurally-generated Realms where conquering each one yields precious rewards.

Using the same party hero concept and card battle system, Realm runs do away with quests and stories, hence offering a much faster paced yet progressively more intense challenge than the Campaign runs.
